00156 #define BUDDY_MERC( prof, bud ) ((prof)->bBuddy[0] == (bud) || (prof)->bBuddy[1] == (bud) || (prof)->bBuddy[2] == (bud) )
00157 #define HATED_MERC( prof, hat ) ((prof)->bHated[0] == (hat) || (prof)->bHated[1] == (hat) || (prof)->bHated[2] == (hat) )
